name: ceil
description: Ceils a duration to a given granularity.
examples:
ceil('PT2s', 'PT5S') // => PT6S
ceil('PT3s', 'PT5S') // => PT6S
ceil('PT4s', 'PT5S') // => PT8S

name: ceilSeconds
description: Ceil a given ISO duration to the next second.

name: ceilMinutes
description: Ceil a given ISO duration to the next minute.

name: ceilHours
description: Ceil a given ISO duration to the next hour.

name: ceilDays
description: Ceil a given ISO duration to the next day.

name: ceilWeeks
description: Ceil a given ISO duration to the next week.

name: ceilMonths
description: Ceil a given ISO duration to the next month.

name: ceilYears
description: Ceil a given ISO duration to the next year.

name: asMicroseconds
description:
Converts a isoDuration to microseconds. Throws an error when the duration
contains a date unit because those can't be converted reliably to time units.

name: asMilliseconds
description:
Converts a isoDuration to milliseconds. Throws an error when the duration
contains a date unit because those can't be converted reliably to time units.

name: asSeconds
description:
Converts a isoDuration to seconds. Throws an error when the duration
contains a date unit because those can't be converted reliably to time units.

name: asMinutes
description:
Converts a isoDuration to minutes. Throws an error when the duration
contains a date unit because those can't be converted reliably to time units.

name: asHours
description:
Converts a isoDuration to hours. Throws an error when the duration
contains a date unit because those can't be converted reliably to time units.

name: asDecimalMicroseconds
description:
Converts a duration to decimal microseconds. Throws an error when the duration
contains a date unit because those can't be converted reliably to time units.

name: asDecimalMilliseconds
description:
Converts a duration to decimal milliseconds. Throws an error when the duration
contains a date unit because those can't be converted reliably to time units.

name: asDecimalSeconds
description:
Converts a duration to decimal seconds. Throws an error when the duration
contains a date unit because those can't be converted reliably to time units.

name: asDecimalMinutes
description:
Converts a duration to decimal minutes. Throws an error when the duration
contains a date unit because those can't be converted reliably to time units.

name: asDecimalHours
description:
Converts a duration to decimal hours. Throws an error when the duration
contains a date unit because those can't be converted reliably to time units.

name: findSeconds
description: Finds the seconds in a given ISO8601 duration string.

name: findMinutes
description: Finds the minutes in a given ISO8601 duration string.

name: findHours
description: Finds the hours in a given ISO8601 duration string.

name: findDays
description: Finds the days in a given ISO8601 duration string.

name: findWeeks
description: Finds the weeks in a given ISO8601 duration string.

name: findMonths
description: Finds the months in a given ISO8601 duration string.

name: findYears
description: Finds the years in a given ISO8601 duration string.

name: floor
description: Floor a duration by a given granularity.
examples:
floor('PT2s', 'PT5S') // => PT4S
floor('PT3s', 'PT5S') // => PT3S
floor('PT4s', 'PT5S') // => PT4S

name: floorSeconds
description: Floor a given ISO duration to the current second.

name: floorMinutes
description: Floor a given ISO duration to the current minute.

name: floorHours
description: Floor a given ISO duration to the current hour.

name: floorDays
description: Floor a given ISO duration to the current day.

name: floorWeeks
description: Floor a given ISO duration to the current week.

name: floorMonths
description: Floor a given ISO duration to the current month.

name: floorYears
description: Floor a given ISO duration to the current year.

name: fromMicroseconds
description: Converts a given number to an ISO8601 duration

name: fromMilliseconds
description: Converts a given number to an ISO8601 duration

name: fromSeconds
description: Converts a given number to an ISO8601 duration

name: fromMinutes
description: Converts a given number to an ISO8601 duration

name: fromHours
description: Converts a given number to an ISO8601 duration

name: fromDays
description: Converts a given number to an ISO8601 duration

name: fromWeeks
description: Converts a given number to an ISO8601 duration

name: fromMonths
description: Converts a given number to an ISO8601 duration

name: fromYears
description: Converts a given number to an ISO8601 duration

name: inSeconds
description: Converts all time parts of an ISO8601 duration to seconds and returns the ISO8601 duration string.

name: inMinutes
description: Converts all time parts of an ISO8601 duration to minutes and returns the ISO8601 duration string.

name: inHours
description: Converts all time parts of an ISO8601 duration to hours and returns the ISO8601 duration string.

name: subtract
description: Subtracts the given iso duration from the given duration.

name: subtractMilliseconds
description: Subtracts the given amount of milliseconds from the given duration.

params.description: number of milliseconds to be subtracted
params.name: amount

name: subtractMicroseconds
description: Subtracts the given amount of microseconds to microseconds from the duration.

params.description: number of microseconds to be subtracted
params.name: amount

name: subtractSeconds
description: Subtracts the given amount of microseconds seconds from the given duration.

name: subtractMinutes
description: Subtracts the given amount of microseconds minutes frome given duration.

name: subtractHours
description: Subtracts the given amount of hours from the given duration.

name: subtractDays
description: Subtracts the given amount of days from the given duration.

name: subtractWeeks
description: Subtracts the given amount of weeks from the given duration.

name: subtractMonths
description: Subtracts the given amount of microseconds months frome given duration.

name: subtractYears
description: Adds the given amount of microseconds to the given duration.

name: toIso
description: Converts an object to an ISO duration.

params.description:
object containing the unit as key.
   (available keys: seconds, minutes, hours, days, weeks, months, years)
params.name: fragments

name: toFragments
description: Splits all components of an ISO8601 duration into its units.

name: isValid
description: Returns if the iso8601 duration is valid or not.

name: isInvalid
description: Returns if the iso8601 duration is invalid or not.

name: whenInvalid
description: Returns a default value when the given duration is invalid and duration when it is valid.

name: whenInvalidDuration
description:
Returns a given default value when the given duration matches the string 'Invalid Duration'.
In comparison to whenInvalid the function only returns the default value when it exactly matches
the 'Invalid Duration' string. Otherwise it just returns the value. In many cases you would prefer
this function over `whenInvalid`.

name: add
description: Adds two iso durations

name: addMicroseconds
description: Adds the given amount of microseconds to the given duration.

name: addMilliseconds
description: Adds the given amount of milliseconds to the given duration.

name: addSeconds
description: Adds the given amount of seconds to the given duration.

name: addMinutes
description: Adds the given amount of minutes to the given duration.

name: addHours
description: Adds the given amount of hours to the given duration.

name: addDays
description: Adds the given amount of hours to the given duration.

name: addWeeks
description: Adds the given amount of hours to the given duration.

name: addMonths
description: Adds the given amount of hours to the given duration.

name: addYears
description: Adds the given amount of hours to the given duration.
